content:
Recently, I am more and more often finding myself thinking "we should completely redesign bit X, it worked OK so far, but is not tenable long term".

As the amount of things I want to have redesigned is bigger than my throughput for actually doing the work, I've decided to more actively log them, with a black Design mark

https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3ADesign
